name: pinry
description: Pinry is a self-hosted image pinboard app similar to Pinterest. It includes tagging, boards, and user profiles, ideal for organizing image collections or inspiration boards.
features: Image pinning: Save images from the web or upload directly to create visual collections.
Board organization: Create boards to organize pins by theme, project, or category.
Tag system: Apply tags to pins for additional categorization and searchability.
User profiles: Customize profiles with avatars, bios, and public pin collections.
Social features: Follow other users, like pins, and discover content from the community.
Browser bookmarklet: Pin images from any website using a simple bookmarklet tool.
Grid layout: Display pins in a responsive masonry grid that adapts to different screen sizes.
Search functionality: Find pins by tags, descriptions, or board names across all collections.
Privacy controls: Set boards as public or private to control who can view your pins.
Image metadata: Automatically extract and display image dimensions, source URLs, and descriptions.
Multi-user support: Host a pinboard for multiple users with individual accounts and collections.
API access: Programmatically create and manage pins using a RESTful API.
